meanings.definition: Somewhat stout in size or build.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was stoutish, with a round belly and short legs.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the stoutish man lifting heavy boxes effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The stoutish teddy bear struggled to fit through the tiny door.
meanings.sent4: The stoutish tree trunk stood firm against the strong winds.
meanings.sent5: His stoutish figure made him easily recognizable in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Resembling stout in appearance or quality.
meanings.sent1: The stoutish chair looked sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent2: The old book had a stoutish cover that showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The stoutish cupcake was too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her stoutish determination carried her through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The stoutish aroma of coffee filled the room, inviting everyone in.
